data.advice: Focus on Health, Not Appearance: Instead of solely focusing on gaining weight for aesthetic reasons, prioritize overall health and well-being. Encourage a balanced diet and regular exercise to promote strength, energy, and vitality.
Keep on going you have a balanced BMI.
Physical Activity: Suggest incorporating regular physical activity into your routine. Encourage activities you enjoy and can sustain over time, such as walking, swimming, cycling, or dancing.
